cn68xx_regs.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 /*! \file cn68xx_regs.h
00003     \brief Host Driver: Register Address and Register Mask values for
00004                         Octeon CN68XX devices.
00005 */

00066 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Input queues */
00067 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_INSTR_ENB               0x1000
00068 
00069 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output queues */
00070 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_OUT_ENB                 0x1010
00071 
00072 
00073 /* 1 register (32-bit) to determine whether Output queues are in reset. */
00074 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PORT_IN_RST_OQ              0x11F0
00075 
00076 /* 1 register (32-bit) to determine whether Input queues are in reset. */
00077 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PORT_IN_RST_IQ              0x11F4
00078

00082 /*###################### REQUEST QUEUE #########################*/
00083 
00084 /* 1 register (32-bit) - instr. size of each input queue. */
00085 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_INSTR_SIZE             0x1020
00086 
00087 /* 32 registers for Input Queue Instr Count - SLI_PKT_IN_DONE0_CNTS */
00088 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT_START       0x2000
00089 
00090 /* 32 registers for Input Queue Start Addr - SLI_PKT0_INSTR_BADDR */
00091 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_BASE_ADDR_START64       0x2800
00092 
00093 /* 32 registers for Input Doorbell - SLI_PKT0_INSTR_BAOFF_DBELL */
00094 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_DOORBELL_START          0x2C00
00095 
00096 /* 32 registers for Input Queue size - SLI_PKT0_INSTR_FIFO_RSIZE */
00097 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_SIZE_START              0x3000
00098 
00099 /* 32 registers for Instruction Header Options - SLI_PKT0_INSTR_HEADER */
00100 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR_START64   0x3400
00101 
00102 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PORT0_PKIND             0x0800
00103 
00104 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Back Pressure for each input queue - SLI_PKT0_IN_BP */
00105 #define    CN68XX_SLI_INPUT_BP_START64           0x3800
00106 
00107 /* Each Input Queue register is at a 16-byte Offset in BAR0 */
00108 #define    CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET                      0x10
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114 /* 1 register (32-bit) - ES, RO, NS, Arbitration for Input Queue Data &
00115                          gather list fetches. SLI_PKT_INPUT_CONTROL.
00116 */
00117 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_INPUT_CONTROL          0x1170
00118 
00119 
00120 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Number of instructions to read at one time
00121                          - 2 bits for each input ring. SLI_PKT_INSTR_RD_SIZE.
00122 */
00123 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_INSTR_RD_SIZE          0x11A0
00124 
00125 
00126 /* 1 register (64-bit) - Assign Input ring to MAC port
00127                          - 2 bits for each input ring. SLI_PKT_IN_PCIE_PORT.
00128 */
00129 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IN_PCIE_PORT               0x11B0

00134 /*------- Request Queue Macros ---------*/
00135 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_BASE_ADDR64(iq)          \
00136        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_BASE_ADDR_START64 + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00137 
00138 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_SIZE(iq)                 \
00139        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_SIZE_START + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00140 
00141 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR64(iq)      \
00142        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PKT_INSTR_HDR_START64 + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00143 
00144 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_DOORBELL(iq)             \
00145        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_DOORBELL_START + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00146 
00147 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT(iq)          \
00148        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_INSTR_COUNT_START + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00149 
00150 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_BP64(iq)                 \
00151        (CN68XX_SLI_INPUT_BP_START64 + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))
00152 
00153 #define    CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PORT_PKIND(iq)           \
00154        (CN68XX_SLI_IQ_PORT0_PKIND + ((iq) * CN68XX_IQ_OFFSET))

00159 /*------------------ Masks ----------------*/
00160 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_ROUND_ROBIN_ARB         (1 << 22)
00161 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_NS                 (1 << 8)
00162 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP        (1 << 6)
00163 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_RO                 (1 << 5)
00164 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR                 (1 << 4)
00165 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_NS               (1 << 3)
00166 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_ES_64B_SWAP      (2)
00167 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_RO               (1)
00168 
00169 #if  __CAVIUM_BYTE_ORDER == __CAVIUM_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00170 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_MASK                    \
00171             ( CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP     \
00172             | CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR )
00173 #else
00174 #define    CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_MASK                    \
00175            ( CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_DATA_ES_64B_SWAP      \
00176             | CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_USE_CSR              \
00177             | CN68XX_INPUT_CTL_GATHER_ES_64B_SWAP)
00178 #endif

00182 /*############################ OUTPUT QUEUE #########################*/
00183 
00184 /* 32 registers for Output queue buffer and info size - SLI_PKT0_OUT_SIZE */
00185 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ0_BUFF_INFO_SIZE         0x0C00
00186 
00187 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Start Addr - SLI_PKT0_SLIST_BADDR */
00188 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_BASE_ADDR_START64       0x1400
00189 
00190 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Credits - SLI_PKT0_SLIST_BAOFF_DBELL */
00191 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKT_CREDITS_START       0x1800
00192 
00193 /* 32 registers for Output Queue size - SLI_PKT0_SLIST_FIFO_RSIZE */
00194 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_SIZE_START              0x1C00
00195 
00196 /* 32 registers for Output Queue Packet Count - SLI_PKT0_CNTS */
00197 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKT_SENT_START          0x2400
00198 
00199 
00200 /* Each Output Queue register is at a 16-byte Offset in BAR0 */
00201 #define    CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET                      0x10
00202 
00203 
00204 
00205 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00206    - Relaxed Ordering setting for reading Output Queues descriptors
00207    - SLI_PKT_SLIST_ROR */
00208 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_SLIST_ROR              0x1030
00209 
00210 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00211    - No Snoop mode for reading Output Queues descriptors
00212    - SLI_PKT_SLIST_NS */
00213 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_SLIST_NS               0x1040
00214 
00215 /* 1 register (64-bit) - 2 bits for each output queue
00216    - Endian-Swap mode for reading Output Queue descriptors
00217    - SLI_PKT_SLIST_ES */
00218 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_SLIST_ES64             0x1050
00219 
00220 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00221    - InfoPtr mode for Output Queues.
00222    - SLI_PKT_IPTR */
00223 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_IPTR                   0x1070
00224 
00225 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00226    - DPTR format selector for Output queues.
00227    - SLI_PKT_DPADDR */
00228 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_DPADDR                 0x1080
00229 
00230 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00231    - Relaxed Ordering setting for reading Output Queues data
00232    - SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ROR */
00233 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ROR           0x1090
00234 
00235 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00236    - No Snoop mode for reading Output Queues data
00237    - SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_NS */
00238 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_NS            0x10A0
00239 
00240 /* 1 register (64-bit)  - 2 bits for each output queue
00241    - Endian-Swap mode for reading Output Queue data
00242    - SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ES */
00243 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_DATA_OUT_ES64          0x10B0
00244 
00245 /* 1 register (32-bit) - 1 bit for each output queue
00246    - Controls whether SLI_PKTn_CNTS is incremented for bytes or for packets.
00247    - SLI_PKT_OUT_BMODE */
00248 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_OUT_BMODE              0x10D0
00249 
00250 /* 1 register (64-bit) - 2 bits for each output queue
00251    - Assign PCIE port for Output queues
00252    - SLI_PKT_PCIE_PORT. */
00253 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_PCIE_PORT64            0x10E0
00254 
00255 
00256 
00257 /* 1 (64-bit) register for Output Queue Packet Count Interrupt Threshold
00258    & Time Threshold. The same setting applies to all 32 queues.
00259    The register is defined as a 64-bit registers, but we use the
00260    32-bit offsets to define distinct addresses. */
00261 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_INT_LEVEL_PKTS          0x1120
00262 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_INT_LEVEL_TIME          0x1124
00263 
00264 
00265 /* 1 (64-bit register) for Output Queue backpressure across all rings. */
00266 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_WMARK                   0x1180
00267 
00268 
00269 #define    CN68XX_SLI_TX_PIPE                    0x1230
00270 
00271 
00272 
00273 /*------- Output Queue Macros ---------*/
00274 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_BASE_ADDR64(oq)          \
00275        (CN68XX_SLI_OQ_BASE_ADDR_START64 + ((oq) * CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00276 
00277 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_SIZE(oq)                 \
00278        (CN68XX_SLI_OQ_SIZE_START + ((oq) * CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00279 
00280 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_BUFF_INFO_SIZE(oq)                 \
00281        (CN68XX_SLI_OQ0_BUFF_INFO_SIZE + ((oq) * CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00282 
00283 
00284 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKTS_SENT(oq)            \
00285        (CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKT_SENT_START + ((oq) * CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET))
00286 
00287 #define    CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKTS_CREDIT(oq)          \
00288        (CN68XX_SLI_OQ_PKT_CREDITS_START + ((oq) * CN68XX_OQ_OFFSET))

00295 
00296 /*######################### DMA Counters #########################*/
00297 
00298 /* 2 registers (64-bit) - DMA Count - 1 for each DMA counter 0/1. */
00299 #define    CN68XX_DMA_CNT_START                   0x0400
00300 
00301 /* 2 registers (64-bit) - DMA count & Time Interrupt threshold -
00302    SLI_DMA_0_INT_LEVEL */
00303 #define    CN68XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START             0x03E0
00304 
00305 /* Each DMA register is at a 16-byte Offset in BAR0 */
00306 #define    CN68XX_DMA_OFFSET                      0x10
00307 
00308 
00309 /*---------- DMA Counter Macros ---------*/
00310 #define    CN68XX_DMA_CNT(dq)                      \
00311            (CN68XX_DMA_CNT_START + ((dq) * CN68XX_DMA_OFFSET))
00312 
00313 #define    CN68XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL(dq)                \
00314            (CN68XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START + ((dq) * CN68XX_DMA_OFFSET))
00315 
00316 #define    CN68XX_DMA_PKT_INT_LEVEL(dq)            \
00317            (CN68XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START + ((dq) * CN68XX_DMA_OFFSET))
00318 
00319 #define    CN68XX_DMA_TIME_INT_LEVEL(dq)           \
00320            (CN68XX_DMA_INT_LEVEL_START + 4 + ((dq) * CN68XX_DMA_OFFSET))

00329 /*######################## INTERRUPTS #########################*/
00330 
00331 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Interrupt Summary */
00332 #define    CN68XX_SLI_INT_SUM64                  0x0330
00333 
00334 
00335 /* 1 register (64-bit) for Interrupt Enable */
00336 #define    CN68XX_SLI_INT_ENB64_PORT0            0x0340
00337 #define    CN68XX_SLI_INT_ENB64_PORT1            0x0350
00338 
00339 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output Queue Packet/Byte Count Interrupt */
00340 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_CNT_INT_ENB            0x1150
00341 
00342 
00343 /* 1 register (32-bit) to enable Output Queue Packet Timer Interrupt */
00344 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_TIME_INT_ENB           0x1160
00345 
00346 /* 1 register (32-bit) to indicate which Output Queue reached pkt threshold */
00347 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_CNT_INT                0x1130
00348 
00349 /* 1 register (32-bit) to indicate which Output Queue reached time threshold */
00350 #define    CN68XX_SLI_PKT_TIME_INT               0x1140

00356 /*------------------ Interrupt Masks ----------------*/
00357 
00358 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RML_TIMEOUT_ERR           (1)
00359 
00360 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RESERVED1                 (1 << 1)
00361 
00362 #define    CN68XX_INTR_BAR0_RW_TIMEOUT_ERR       (1 << 2)
00363 #define    CN68XX_INTR_IO2BIG_ERR                (1 << 3)
00364 
00365 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PKT_COUNT                 (1 << 4)
00366 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PKT_TIME                  (1 << 5)
00367 
00368 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RESERVED2                 (3 << 6)
00369 
00370 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M0UPB0_ERR                (1 << 8)
00371 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M0UPWI_ERR                (1 << 9)
00372 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M0UNB0_ERR                (1 << 10)
00373 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M0UNWI_ERR                (1 << 11)
00374 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M1UPB0_ERR                (1 << 12)
00375 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M1UPWI_ERR                (1 << 13)
00376 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M1UNB0_ERR                (1 << 14)
00377 #define    CN68XX_INTR_M1UNWI_ERR                (1 << 15)
00378 
00379 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MIO_INT0                  (1 << 16)
00380 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MIO_INT1                  (1 << 17)
00381 
00382 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MAC_INT0                  (1 << 18)
00383 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MAC_INT1                  (1 << 19)
00384 
00385 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RESERVED3                 (0xFFF << 20)
00386 
00387 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_FORCE                (1ULL << 32)
00388 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_FORCE                (1ULL << 33)
00389 
00390 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_COUNT                (1ULL << 34)
00391 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_COUNT                (1ULL << 35)
00392 
00393 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME                 (1ULL << 36)
00394 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_TIME                 (1ULL << 37)
00395 
00396 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RESERVED4                 (0x3FFULL << 38)
00397 
00398 #define    CN68XX_INTR_INSTR_DB_OF_ERR           (1ULL << 48)
00399 #define    CN68XX_INTR_SLIST_DB_OF_ERR           (1ULL << 49)
00400 #define    CN68XX_INTR_POUT_ERR                  (1ULL << 50)
00401 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PIN_BP_ERR                (1ULL << 51)
00402 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PGL_ERR                   (1ULL << 52)
00403 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PDI_ERR                   (1ULL << 53)
00404 #define    CN68XX_INTR_POP_ERR                   (1ULL << 54)
00405 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PINS_ERR                  (1ULL << 55)
00406 #define    CN68XX_INTR_SPRT0_ERR                 (1ULL << 56)
00407 #define    CN68XX_INTR_SPRT1_ERR                 (1ULL << 57)
00408 
00409 #define    CN68XX_INTR_RESERVED5                 (3ULL << 58)
00410 
00411 #define    CN68XX_INTR_ILL_PAD_ERR               (1ULL << 60)
00412 
00413 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PIPE_ERR                  (1ULL << 61)
00414 
00415 
00416 
00417 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_DATA                 (CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME)
00418 
00419 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_DATA                 (CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_TIME )
00420 
00421 #define    CN68XX_INTR_DMA_DATA                  \
00422             (CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_DATA | CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_DATA )
00423 
00424 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PKT_DATA                  (CN68XX_INTR_PKT_TIME)
00425 
00426 
00427 /* Sum of interrupts for all PCI-Express Data Interrupts */
00428 #define    CN68XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA                 \
00429            ( CN68XX_INTR_DMA_DATA | CN68XX_INTR_PKT_DATA )
00430 
00431 
00432 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MIO                       \
00433            ( CN68XX_INTR_MIO_INT0 | CN68XX_INTR_MIO_INT1 )
00434 
00435 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MAC                       \
00436            ( CN68XX_INTR_MAC_INT0 | CN68XX_INTR_MAC_INT1 )
00437 
00438 
00439 /* Sum of interrupts for error events */
00440 #define    CN68XX_INTR_ERR                       \
00441            (  CN68XX_INTR_BAR0_RW_TIMEOUT_ERR    \
00442             | CN68XX_INTR_IO2BIG_ERR             \
00443             | CN68XX_INTR_M0UPB0_ERR             \
00444             | CN68XX_INTR_M0UPWI_ERR             \
00445             | CN68XX_INTR_M0UNB0_ERR             \
00446             | CN68XX_INTR_M0UNWI_ERR             \
00447             | CN68XX_INTR_M1UPB0_ERR             \
00448             | CN68XX_INTR_M1UPWI_ERR             \
00449             | CN68XX_INTR_M1UPB0_ERR             \
00450             | CN68XX_INTR_M1UNWI_ERR             \
00451             | CN68XX_INTR_INSTR_DB_OF_ERR        \
00452             | CN68XX_INTR_SLIST_DB_OF_ERR        \
00453             | CN68XX_INTR_POUT_ERR               \
00454             | CN68XX_INTR_PIN_BP_ERR             \
00455             | CN68XX_INTR_PGL_ERR                \
00456             | CN68XX_INTR_PDI_ERR                \
00457             | CN68XX_INTR_POP_ERR                \
00458             | CN68XX_INTR_PINS_ERR               \
00459             | CN68XX_INTR_SPRT0_ERR              \
00460             | CN68XX_INTR_SPRT1_ERR              \
00461             | CN68XX_INTR_ILL_PAD_ERR)
00462 
00463 
00464 
00465 /* Programmed Mask for Interrupt Sum */
00466 #ifdef CVMCS_DMA_IC
00467 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MASK                      \
00468            (  CN68XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA              \
00469             | CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_COUNT             \
00470             | CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_TIME             \
00471             | CN68XX_INTR_MIO                    \
00472             | CN68XX_INTR_MAC                    \
00473             | CN68XX_INTR_ERR)
00474 #else
00475 #define    CN68XX_INTR_MASK                      \
00476            (  CN68XX_INTR_PCIE_DATA              \
00477             | CN68XX_INTR_DMA0_FORCE             \
00478             | CN68XX_INTR_DMA1_FORCE             \
00479             | CN68XX_INTR_MIO                    \
00480             | CN68XX_INTR_MAC                    \
00481             | CN68XX_INTR_ERR)
00482 #endif

00502 /* CN63XX BAR1 Index registers. */
00503 #define    CN68XX_PEM_BAR1_INDEX000                0x00011800C00000A8ULL
00504

00506 #define    CN68XX_PCI_BAR1_OFFSET                  0x8
00507

00509            (CN68XX_BAR1_INDEX_START + (CN68XX_PCI_BAR1_OFFSET * (idx)))

00525 
00526 #define    CN68XX_DPI_REQ_ERR_RST         0x0001df0000000060ULL

00529 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_ENG0_ENB        0x0001df0000000080ULL
00530

00532               (CN68XX_DPI_DMA_ENG0_ENB + (q_no * 8))
00533 
00534 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_ENG0_BUF        0x0001df0000000880ULL

00537               (CN68XX_DPI_DMA_ENG0_BUF + (q_no * 8))

00542             (CN68XX_DPI_SLI_PRT0_CFG + (port * 0x10))

00545 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_COMMIT_MODE     (1ULL << 58)
00546 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_PKT_HP          (1ULL << 57)
00547 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_PKT_EN          (1ULL << 56)
00548 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_ENB             (0x1FULL << 48)
00549 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_ES            (1 << 15)
00550 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_MODE          (1 << 14)
00551 
00552 #ifdef CVMCS_DMA_IC
00553 /* Set the DMA Control, to update packet count not byte count sent by DMA,
00554    when we use Interrupt Coalescing (CA mode) */
00555 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_ADD1      (1 << 19)
00556 
00557 #define    CN68XX_DPI_DMA_CTL_MASK             \
00558            (CN68XX_DPI_DMA_COMMIT_MODE    |    \
00559             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_PKT_HP         |    \
00560             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_PKT_EN         |    \
00561             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_ADD1         |    \
00562             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_ES           |    \
00563             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_O_MODE)
00564 #else

00566            (CN68XX_DPI_DMA_COMMIT_MODE    |    \

00568             CN68XX_DPI_DMA_PKT_EN         |    \
